title: TOMA 4 - Fairbanks Correctional Center
description:
In which Russ and I find ourselves wearing shorts without underwear in a medium-security Alaskan prison.



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
